name: Zombie like burger
description:
Zombie like burger is a survival game, you need to protect the last burger against zombie in 2d.

As the player, you need to shoot the zombie before they reach the last burger and try to do the best scoring. 

This game is a student project make in  one week, i hope you will enjoy it 

PC Controls

Arrows - Move 

Space bar - Shoot 

Credits

Programming - Mathieu Way

Art and Design - Romain Vuarchex
